itemDisplayName: Create a Two VM AD With SQL, SSAS MD, and SSRS Deployment
description: This template creates two new Azure VMs, each with a public IP address and load balancer and a VNet, it configures one VM to be an AD DC for a new Forest and Domain. Other VM with SQL Server db engin/SSAS MD/SSRS domain joined, both VMs have public facing RDP.
summary: This template creates a Microsoft BI enivornment with Acitve Directory
